title: A choir as big as the Internet
description: 185 voices from 12 countries join a choir that spans the globe: "Lux Aurumque," composed and conducted by Eric Whitacre, merges hundreds of tracks individually recorded and posted to YouTube. It's an astonishing illustration of how technology can connect us.
author: Eric Whitacre
keywords: TED, talks, Internet, music, online video, performance, web
